d:frontcover.d:creator: Frederick P. Brooks, Jr.
d:frontcover.p: Anniversary edition with four new chapters

section.p: The original book plus four additional chapters!

Few books on software project management have been as influential and timeless as The Mythical Man-Month. With a blend of software engineering facts and thought-proviking opinions, Fred Brooks offers insight for anyone managing complex projects. . . .
Frederick P. Brooks, Jr. is the recipient of the ACM's 1999 A. M. Turing Award, the most prestigious technical award in the computing field. . . .
